title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For any use of conservation of energy

For example, initially the small block has only potential energy, and it is all converted to kinetic energy when it reaches the bottom of the ramp.

1 point is earned: For a correct expression for the initial potential energy

1 point is earned: For a correct expression for the kinetic energy at the bottom of the ramp

stimulusHtml:

M(3.5v0) = Mv + (1.5M)(2v0)

v = 3.5v0 - 3v0
